Generation IX.Scarlet: The pleasant aroma that emanates from this Pokémon’s body helps wheat grow, so Dachsbun has been treasured by farming villages.
Generation IX.Violet: The surface of this Pokémon's skin hardens when exposed to intense heat, and its body has an appetizing aroma.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area Six East Province: Area Three West Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ , 6★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area Six East Province: Area Three West Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ , 6★ )
